document.full_text: an arizona jail inmate who feared he would be killed by a mexican drug cartel if were set free assaulted a detention officer in order to remain behind bars, authorities said on tuesday.
document.title: arizona inmate attacks jailer to stay behind bars
lines_and_colors: an arizona jail inmate who feared he would be killed by a mexican drug cartel if were set free assaulted a detention officer in order to remain behind bars, authorities said on tuesday.
